titles.title: To modify the application of temporary limited appointment regulations to the National Park Service, and for other purposes.
To modify the application of temporary limited appointment regulations to the National Park Service, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 115-967.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 755.

action.text: Mr. McClintock moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 6599.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

bill.summary: This bill modifies the application of specified geographic requirements with respect to seasonal employees of the National Park Service.
